transcript: Right, I don't think you have a concept of what I mean by by money. I don't mean money like oh I can't go get my hair and my nails did today I mean like I can't eat

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Brian, I don't think you have a concept of what I mean by- by money.  I don't mean money like oh, I can't go get my hair and my nails done today, I mean like I can't eat.
